FuncDef:
The dhcp relay trust option82 command enables Option 82 on the DHCP relay agent.
The undo dhcp relay trust option82 command disables Option 82 on the DHCP relay agent. The dhcp relay trust option82 command enables Option 82 on the DHCP relay agent. The undo dhcp relay trust option82 command disables Option 82 on the DHCP relay agent. By default, Option 82 is enabled on the DHCP relay agent.
ExtraInfo: This command is used on the DHCP relay agent to enable the Option 82 function. After receiving a DHCP packet that carries the Option 82 field but the giaddr field of the packet is 0, the DHCP relay agent processes the packet by default. Using the undo dhcp relay trust option82 command, the DHCP relay agent discards the packet.
